sqlMap.select: select a.INST_ID, a.INST_NAME, a.INST_TABLE, a.ROW_NUM, to_char(a.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') CREATE_DATE, a.USER_ID, a.STATUS, b.user_name from t02_data_instance a ,t01_sys_user b where a.user_id = b.user_id and INST_NAME like '%'||#instName#||'%' order by INST_ID
sqlMap.insert: insert into t02_data_instance (INST_ID, INST_NAME, INST_TABLE, ROW_NUM, CREATE_DATE, USER_ID, STATUS) values ('$instId$', #instName#, #instTable#, #rowNum#, sysdate, #userId#, '1')
sqlMap.update: update t02_data_instance set INST_NAME='$instName$' where INST_ID='$instId$'
